One of his cars was recently lifted from the lot and apparently used in a few home robberies. In addition to the nightmare that was the insurance company, he was also having to deal with the police. They hadn't recovered the car yet.

He could have an employee handle this but the truth of the matter was that he was tired of dealing with customers as a salesman. That was how he started out. Though he was good at it, he was tired of it. Administrative work, however tedious, was preferable to him now.

"I'll be glad when this is over," he mused to himself.

Just then his desk phone rang. "We've recovered your car," the voice on the other line said.

A few days later, David was looking over the car that had been recovered. The damage wasn't too bad. Looked like he'd only have to extract enough money from the insurance company to have some minor repairs done. He was thinking about how he could convince the insurance company that a few things that were broken previously could be attributed to the theft as well. "Might as well get some compensation for the headache too," he muttered.

One thing that he noticed was that the floor was damp. He added upholstery to his growing list of things to get insurance money for. He bent down to feel the damp floor. In his cursory inspection he flipped the floor mat up to see how bad it was underneath. It was quite wet. "Damn!" he cursed as he ran his fingers over the damp carpet. He then pulled his hand back abruptly as he began imagining some possible sources of this unexplained moisture.

He was about to flip the floor mat back down when a glint in the crevice of the floor caught his eye. He tentatively reached forward and grabbed a small chunk of glass that was wedged between the floor and the center console.

He pulled the small object out of the car and looked at it. It appeared to be just a chunk of glass at first. As he looked at it he realized that it was cut into a symmetrical shape. This wasn't glass, this appeared to be a diamond. "Probably fake," he grumbled as he put it in his pocket. "Even if it isn't, it doesn't make up for the headache of the stolen car," he added.

He decided to ask one of his employees to take this down to the mechanic that he had a contract with to check for any unseen damage. This was a small enough place that he didn't have that sort of thing on-site.

"Emily," he said as he saw one of his salesmen walking by. She didn't seem to be up to anything right now. He asked her to get the car down to the shop and have it looked at. She smiled and took the keys from David. Then she grumbled under her breath that this didn't pay commissions. David couldn't help but watch as Emily climbed into the car. Her skirt rode up a bit before she closed the door, blocking David's view of her thigh.

David walked back to his office and sat down in his chair. His thoughts were dwelling on Emily. She was actually one of the best salesmen at his company. She was extremely attractive which David thought had to help her out for sure. He put his hands in his pocket and absently turned the diamond around in his fingers. As he was doing this he wondered what it was like for Emily. Did her appearance make it easier for her?

David's vision blacked out extremely quickly no sooner than he had thought this. All of his senses faded. A fraction of a second later his vision and senses returned. He wasn't in his office. "Where the hell am I?" he shrieked. He was too panicked to notice that his voice was way off. It took him a fair bit of time to realize that he was driving a car. He slammed on the brakes in the middle of the road. The car behind him honked.

"What the hell is going on?" he shrieked again. This time he did notice that his voice was off. He raised his hands to his face to see two perfectly manicured dainty hands. He felt like he couldn't breath. He heaved for breath. Finally he turned the rear view mirror toward his face so that he could see.

He was shocked when he saw Emily's beautiful face staring back at him. "This can't be, this cant be ..." he stammered as he frantically touched his face. He was shocked that Emily matched his movements exactly. He looked down at his own body. He was inexplicably wearing a skirt and a blazer. He frantically ran his hands up and down his body. He shuddered every time something felt different or out of place, which was pretty much the entire time.

He forced his eyes away. His mind raced. "what should I do?" he asked.

"So do you still want the Prius?" Mrs. Tran asked. In spite of the circumstances, it took David a moment to realize that she was talking to him. David thought about it for a moment. He didn't really like hybrids much. He felt that they were under-powered. Nevertheless, he could tell distinctly that that was the car Audrey had set her heart on. David somehow even knew that Audrey had already test driven that very one earlier and they were really just here to pick it up.

"Wow," David thought to himself as he realized that he could access her memories. His thoughts were still his own, but he could remember anything that Audrey knew. As he thought about it he realized that he could even allow himself to act like her if he chose to. He could let Audrey take over, or override Audrey's desires or mannerisms with his own. This would certainly prove to be invaluable in passing as Audrey for a while.

"Yes Mother," David replied with the same formal respect that Audrey would normally show to her mother. Even calling her mother rather than Mom as is more common. Once David's body was carried out, Emily seeing to David's body, Jim worked out all of the paperwork with Mrs. Tran. David had gone through this process many times before. He was excited. He couldn't help but feel some of the excitement that Audrey would feel in this very circumstance. He was about to get his own car. The fact that he had his own car, in addition to the ability to use any of the cars on the lot at any time, didn't change his excitement. He allowed what would have been Audrey's excitement to be his.

Soon they were done with all of the paperwork and Mrs. Tran, Mom, was handing David the keys to his own nearly new Prius. "Now be careful," Mrs. Tran warned as she finally relented and handed the keys over. "Be home in an hour," she finally said before going to her own car.

David's mind raced. He was excited by the possibilities. He wondered what he should do.
1211.title: Just enjoy life as Audrey for a few days

12113.content:
Fishing around Audrey's purse for the stone, David figured he ought to figure out more about this thing before he venture forward. If this thing really was responsible for him taking both Emily and Audrey's bodies, then it had a lot of potential, and David might need to harness that potential. Climbing into the Prius, David searched through Audrey's memories again to find where she lived. Thankfully, he didn't need anyone's memories to know how to drive. Putting a small foot to the gas pedal, he left the car lot and drove out to Audrey's house.

---

"You came straight home deary?" Audrey's mother asked, surprised to see her daughter returned so quickly. "Are you sure you don't want to take the car around town some?"

"Yes mother," David replied as he kicked off Audrey's shoes, "I'm just a bit shaken after finding that man back at the dealership is all. I think I need to lie down."

Audrey's mother nodded sympathetically towards the person she thought was her daughter. "Feel free to come on down if you need anything, okay sweetheart?"

David nodded and headed up the stairs to what he knew was Audrey's room. It was a pretty typical place for a teenage girl - pink walls, a big makeup table, posters of bands she liked, and a lot of clothes. With the stone in hand, David lowered himself down on Audrey's bed and began to think about what he did last time. For both Emily and Audrey, he had wondered what their lives were like. Surely it had to work again.

Closing his eyes, David thought about Ms. Tran downstairs, his 'mother'. What was her life like? It must be different being married to a local celebrity, right? Once again, his vision went dark. Upon opening his eyes again, he found himself sitting on a couch in the living room, the TV playing some sitcom he didn't care for. He looked down, finding himself in a taller, more mature body, but still female. He ran off to the house's bathroom, long black hair bouncing about as he found the mirror he was looking.

A smile formed on Ms. Tran's face as David realized just how far this could go. "I can be anyone... anyone! Can... I even die now? Could I switch forever?" He looked down at his new chest, patting down his boobs through her blouse. They were definitely more well developed than Audrey's. Ms. Tran was also wearing pants, which David appreciated.

However, David had to know, what happened to the last body he was in? Would Audrey regain consciousness? Or was Ms. Tran now her daughter? It was hard to know, since his original body apparently went comatose. With this question in mind, he made his way over to Audrey's room and opened up the door, only to find Audrey's body still asleep.

"Audrey?" He asked, shaking her shoulder. "Are you awake?" She didn't respond, but a quick check confirmed she was still breathing and her heart was still beating. David wasn't sure what this meant. "Does my last body always go to sleep? Surely if Ms. Tran isn't in her daughters body, Audrey wasn't stuck in mine... but what happens if mine never wakes up..." David decided to push the thought of his potential mortality out of his mind, instead opting to snatch the stone out of a sleeping Audrey's hand.

"Well Audrey," he said in Ms. Tran's voice to the comatose body, "someone has to be you, and I can't exactly go back to my body until it gets the green-light, so I guess I'll just have to hop back in."

He gave Ms. Tran one more look in the mirror, admiring her more mature form. The responsible thing would be to return to Audrey, lest someone worry about her. However, he could probably stay as Ms. Tran for a little while without anyone noticing. He could also try to jump into a third body, perhaps, to see what would happen to Ms. Tran's consciousness. What'd he decide to do?

121131.content:
David played with the diamond that he held in Ms. Tran's hands and smiled at the sleeping Audrey. "I'll be back in your body soon, dearie. for now, just get your beauty sleep" he said with a wink. He placed the Diamond on Audrey's dresser and left the room, sliding the girl's door closed behind him. David knew that he would have to return to Audrey's body eventually, especially if she was now not waking up. But what was the reasoning for that? David remembered that Emily had returned to the car dealership just fine soon after David had left her body. That meant that it wasn't for the people he took over to remain comatose. what made Audrey different than Emily?

As David began thinking, he grabbed the remote and absent minded began flipping through the channels on TV. Grace Tran, what David found out was Ms. Tran's full name, may have been interested in what plots were developing on her soap opera, but David didn't care for that. Unlike what he had done with Audreys car, David did not let Grace's desires overwrite his own for this. He stopped surfing the channels when he saw a familiar face on the screen. Tim Tran was on the screen, but David was more interested in the picture in the upper corner. It was a picture of himself. David quickly raised the volume to hear what the anchor was saying.

"...earlier when a girl, whose name is being withheld due to her age, discovered him. He had apparently tripped and his his head against the corner of his desk. David Masters was rushed to the hospital, but sadly passed away this afternoon. He has no known family and will be greatly missed by the community..." Suddenly, David felt his stomach sink. He...he was dead? But then how was he still here right now? If his body had died then shouldn't David be in heaven (or hell) by now? Suddenly, David came to a realization. One that he hoped was not true. He remembered how he had returned to his body from Emily's earlier by thinking about returning to his body. David quickly changed the channel back tot he soap opera and sat Grace's body down on the couch.

He closed her eyes and focused on leaving Grace's body. "I want to go back to my body" he said out loud in his sultry voice. "I want to go back to my body.." he repeated this over and over with concentration, hoping that this would work without him needing the diamond. As he expected, David began to feel the familiar feeling of losing Grace's body. He then felt another body forming in it's place. This body didn't feel like his familiar male form though. When he opened his eyes, he quickly sat up and looked around, seeing that he was back in Audrey's room...back in Audrey's body.

"Well shit..." he said in Audrey's voice as he hopped out of her bed and held the diamond in his dainty hand. David was quickly putting together what had happened, and he did not like the conclusion that he reached. David's body must really be dead. If it wasn't he would have returned to his own body instead of to Audrey. His body likely died while he was inside of Audrey's body. When that death happened, Audrey's body became is new default body. When that happened, Audrey's real soul must have ceased to exist since her body was already being controlled. David still had access to her memories and personality, but since he was the only one in her body, it would be left comatose when he leaves it just like his old body was. Whenever he would want to leave someone's body and return to his own, the body he would return to would be Audrey.

David sighed and looked down at the floor. There were so many thoughts going through his mind right now. David, no longer existed. The diamond had made him more or less immortal. As long as his previous default body died while he inhabited a different one, David would never die. At the same time, he had unknowingly caused the 'death' of a sweet 16 year old girl. The real Audrey Tran would never again be able to control her own body. Besides for the times when David lets her personality out to play his part as her, Audrey would never again exist. David now had to throw out any ideas of returning to his old life and his old job. The least that he could do was live out Audrey's life in more or less the way that she wanted to.

On that note, David say down on Audrey's bed and closed his eyes. He concentrated and whispered out loud. "David is dead. I am Audrey Tran. David is dead, I am Audrey Tran. David is dead. I am Audrey Tran. I'm a 16 year old girl and I'm rich. My father is famous and my mother is a beautiful former model. I'm enrolled in a private school where I'm getting the best education money can buy, and I'm a good student. I have a bright future ahead of me, but I don't know what I want to do yet..." this continued for several minutes as David allowed for Audrey's memories and personality to flow into the forefront of his mind. Within ten minutes, the 16 year old girl wasn't even thinking of herself as David again. She smiled and jumped out of bed, looking at the full body mirror in her room with a playful smile on her attractive face.

"Who needs to be David, anyway? My old life totally sucked" she said, talking exactly as she always had. "Like, my name is Audrey Tran. David is dead" she blew said just before she blew a kiss at her reflection. The new Audrey smiled as she picked up the diamond and licked her lips. "Well what should a gorgeous, rich 16 year old girl do with her time now?"

info.brief_description: A small gemstone grants the ability to posses the body of anyone you've ever touched.
info.description:
This story revolves around a man named David. He is a lonely single man who throws himself into his work since he doesn't really have anyone in his life. He owns a medium sized used car lot where he spends nearly all of his time working for lack of any real meaning in his life. He is in his mid thirties and lives alone. He is generally a nice polite guy, but is a bit bitter and will sometimes take advantage of people.

He acquires a small gemstone that allows the user to project their mind into the body of anyone that they have ever touched. Please adhere to the following when adding chapters.

1.) The person being possessed doesn't have to be nearby. There is no limit to the range. Their whereabouts don't even need to be known for it to work.

2.) The person using the stone can only possess people with whom they have had some form of physical contact at any point in the past. A handshake is probably the most common way to achieve this. One can't just possess a famous person or a politician without having first touched them in some way.

3.) The person being possessed is completely unaware of the whole thing. When the possessor leaves, they will regain their full faculties. They will perhaps be a bit disoriented and will have no memory whatsoever of what the other person did, or even that there was another person. To them it will appear as a complete memory gap.

4.) The body of the person using the stone collapses into a catatonic state until such time as they return. All bodily functions remain normal while the stone's user is away. That means the body still needs sustenance and hydration even while nobody is home. It is completely unable to care for these basic needs on its own.

5.) In order to possess someone, the user must be holding or in some other way touching the stone directly.

6.) Chains are allowed. If a person uses the stone to jump into the body of another, they can return to where they are located, pick up the stone and jump again. Their second body will fall down in a catatonic state until such time as the user leave the third body and returns to the second. The limitation of having had physical contact applies to the body that they jump from. This is perhaps a good way to get around that physical contact limitation.

7.) If the person's body dies while they are elsewhere, then the body they are currently occupying becomes their permanent body. The person who was displaced cannot come back in any way in this case. It will be as if their mind also died. Assuming that the stone is reacquired, one can only jump into other people from this body that this body has touched.

Feel free to have some people be immune or more difficult to possess than others. Descriptions of sex and violence are fine but try not to limit the story entirely to that. Don't end the story or kill David (at least not his mind). Please use correct spelling and grammar.

GP will be awarded for chapters that are well written. I may do minor editing on a chapter if there are some minor mistakes. If there is no content in a chapter I'll probably delete it but I'll be conservative about how often I do this as I really do appreciate additions.
